prompt.name: Navigate to Tech Roles section
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the 'Tech Roles' section from the main blog page.

input.action: 'Click on the `Tech Roles` link in the navigation bar'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the 'Tech Roles' section of the blog.

prompt.name: Accept Cookies
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User accepts the cookie policy.

input.action: 'Click on the `OK` button in the cookie banner'

expected.outcome: The cookie banner disappears.

prompt.name: Decline Cookies
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User declines the cookie policy.

input.action: 'Click on the `Decline` button in the cookie banner'

expected.outcome: The cookie banner disappears.

prompt.name: Navigate to second page of blogs
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the second page of blog posts.

input.action: 'Click on the `2` button'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the second page of blog posts.

prompt.name: Navigate to HackerRank Facebook Page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the HackerRank Facebook page from the footer.

input.action: 'Scroll down to the bottom of the page', 'Click on the Facebook icon in the footer'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the HackerRank Facebook page.

prompt.name: Explore a Featured Post
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to and explores a featured blog post.

input.action: 'Click on the first blog post on the page', 'Read the title of the post', 'Scroll to the end of the post'

expected.outcome: The user is on the blog post page and has scrolled to the end.

prompt.name: Read AI Skills Report
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the AI Skills Report from the banner.

input.action: 'Click on the `Read now` button in the AI Skills Report banner', 'Review the AI Skills Report page'

expected.outcome: The user is on the AI Skills Report page.

prompt.name: Explore a Tech Role
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to a specific tech role and explores it.

input.action: 'Hover over `Tech Roles` in the navigation bar', 'Click on the `Artificial Intelligence` link', 'Review the content on the Artificial Intelligence page'

expected.outcome: The user is on the Artificial Intelligence tech role page.

prompt.name: Explore Products Dropdown
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the Products dropdown menu and navigates to the 'Interview' page.

input.action: 'Hover over `Products` in the main navigation header', 'Click on `Interview`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the HackerRank Interview product page.

prompt.name: Explore Resources Dropdown
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the Resources dropdown menu and navigates to the 'Customer Stories' page.

input.action: 'Hover over `Resources` in the main navigation header', 'Click on `Customer Stories`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the HackerRank Customer Stories page.

prompt.name: Explore Solutions Dropdown
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User explores the Solutions dropdown menu and navigates to the 'Remote Hiring' page.

input.action: 'Hover over `Solutions` in the main navigation header', 'Click on `Remote Hiring`'

expected.outcome: The user is taken to the HackerRank Remote Hiring solutions page.

prompt.name: Navigate to a specific category of posts
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to a blog post and then to the category page it is under to see all posts under that category.

input.action: 'Click on the first blog post on the page', 'Click on the category link above the post title', 'Review the category page'

expected.outcome: The user is on the category page, viewing all posts under that category.

prompt.name: Navigate to a blog post on the second page
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the second page of the blog and opens a blog post.

input.action: 'Click on the `2` button', 'Click on the first blog post after the Featured section on the page'

expected.outcome: The user is on a blog post from the second page.

prompt.name: Explore Customer Stories
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Customer Stories page and explores a story.

input.action: 'Hover over `Resources` in the main navigation header', 'Click on `Customer Stories`', 'Click on the first customer story'

expected.outcome: The user is viewing a specific customer story.

prompt.name: Explore the Roles Directory
prompt.instruction: go to https://www.hackerrank.com/blog/ and perform the following test case
prompt.description: User navigates to the Roles Directory and explores it.

input.action: 'Hover over `Resources` in the main navigation header', 'Click on `Roles Directory`', 'Click on the `View all roles` button to go to the `All roles` section', 'Click on a role under the `All roles` section'

expected.outcome: The user is viewing a specific role in the Roles Directory.
